param.name: FilterCreator
param.description: Show only Machine Groups from a specific Creator. Type in Creator name or Use "All" to show all Machine Groups

properties.comments: Filter output to something usable by deleting the import-module debug info

settings.source:
# split string so import-module information is filtered out # this is done by filtering everything before <split> within the string
$input = "$[Result]" $input -split "<break>" | select -Last 1

folder.name: Ivanti Patch for Windows Servers (Formerly Shavlik Protect)

settings.source:
# Set variables $uid ="$[UID]"
# Import API module Import-Module STProtect -force
# create breakline to filter results # needed because import-module STProtect ALWAYS gives output whatever I try to ignore the text # Please fix this Shavlik write-host "<break>"
#check if module is loaded else error out if (Get-Module -ListAvailable -Name STProtect) {
# Module STProtect is loaded and available to use # Do action!
Invoke-DownloadMissingPatches -scanuid $uid
# there is no feedback from this command even if the scanID cannot be found } # module not loaded else { Write-Host "Module does not exist" }

folder.name: Ivanti Patch for Windows Servers (Formerly Shavlik Protect)

settings.source:
# Set variables $uid ="$[UID]"
# Import API module Import-Module STProtect -force
# create breakline to filter results # needed because import-module STProtect ALWAYS gives output whatever I try to ignore the text # Please fix this Shavlik write-host "<break>"
#check if module is loaded else error out if (Get-Module -ListAvailable -Name STProtect) {
# Module STProtect is loaded and available to use # Do action!
$patchdeploy = Start-PatchDeploy -scanuid $uid Wait-PatchDeploy -Uid $patchdeploy.uid.Guid
# return value $patchdeploy.uid.Guid } # module not loaded else { Write-Host "Module does not exist" }

properties.comments: Filter output to something usable by deleting the import-module debug info

settings.source:
# split string so import-module information is filtered out # this is done by filtering everything before <split> within the string
$input = "$[Result]" $input -split "<break>" | select -Last 1

folder.name: Ivanti Patch for Windows Servers (Formerly Shavlik Protect)

properties.comments: Patch Deploy - Start (do not wait till finished)

settings.source:
# Set variables $uid ="$[UID]"
# Import API module Import-Module STProtect -force
# create breakline to filter results # needed because import-module STProtect ALWAYS gives output whatever I try to ignore the text # Please fix this Shavlik write-host "<break>"
#check if module is loaded else error out if (Get-Module -ListAvailable -Name STProtect) {
# Module STProtect is loaded and available to use # Do action!
$patchdeploy = Start-PatchDeploy -scanuid $uid
# return value $patchdeploy.uid.Guid } # module not loaded else { Write-Host "Module does not exist" }
